text:
Unfortunately I don't think #WalleysQuarry will be shut down. I suspect pressure from central government is being applied to keep it open. That would explain why @EnvAgencyMids have completely abandoned their role as regulator and taken on the role of facilitator.

#StopTheStink

@loug0802 @YorkshireWater @EnvAgency We're very sorry to hear that. If you look on our website we've numerous others come forward telling how they were ill after swimming. This is why we're so keen to get proper signage put up to warn people of the danger. I hope he's made a full recovery.

Cross sector collaboration to meet regional water resource needs - 23rd June.

urls.title: Petition: Give the Environment Agency the funds and freedom to protect English rivers
urls.description: The Government must reverse years of cuts to Agency budgets, increase charges for polluters, and give the Agency freedom from overly business-friendly Government codes and guidance, so it can pursue and achieve its principal statutory objective to protect and enhance English rivers
